1470249212432588805.full_text: December 13 marks China's national memorial day for the victims of the #NanjingMassacre. On this day in 1937, Japanese troops captured the city of Nanjing. Around 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers were brutally killed in over six weeks. https://t.co/zniB0RsrIx
